summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Galer Street from Seventeenth Avenue North to Twenty-fourth Avenue north et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 13972, creating Local Improvement District No. 1280 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
